sections.heading: to 29-12-4 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1990, ch. 17, § 1 repealed 29-12-1 to 29-12-4 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1979, ch. 142, § 1, and amended by Laws 1987, ch. 139, § 1, creating the crime stoppers commission, effective July 1, 2000. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1989 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For similar present provisions,see29-12A-1 NMSA 1978.
